trans-unit.note: Standard text in a composer block
trans-unit.target: Bydd yr arolwg hwn yn cymryd 1-2 funud o'ch amser. Mae pob ateb a'r cyfranogiad yn ddienw.
trans-unit.source: This survey will take 1-2 minutes of your time. All answers and participation are anonymous.

trans-unit.note: Standard text in a composer block
trans-unit.target: Rydym yn trin eich data fel mae'n cael ei ddisgrifio ym Mholisi Preifatrwydd Mozilla.
trans-unit.source: We handle your data as described in the Mozilla Privacy Policy.

trans-unit.note: Standard text in a composer block

trans-unit.target: Helpwch ni i ddiwallu eich anghenion preifatrwydd a diogelwch drwy roi adborth ar eich profiad gyda Mozilla VPN.
trans-unit.source: Help us meet your privacy and security needs by providing feedback on your experience with Mozilla VPN.

trans-unit.target: Helpwch ni i wella Mozilla VPN
